short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can track Buybox price, Buybox winner, Seller rating and the number of competitors for every product in your store.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Great tool for tracking your buy box status on amazon site. Saves your time by displaying all product status in one dashboard along with other additional information like number of review, number of sellers competing. This also displays whether seller is using FBA or MFN. You can also download CSV of this data to further analysis. Now works across all Amazon marketplaces. Powered by Seller gyan
